text: hayyyysss. Sige let's go even lower, Sir. https://t.co/AGX5yfX8vE

author: Pat :)
text: 10. Boss sana if you see us struggling help us, kahit yun lang. We were onced made you name the best. Super proud ka. Now that we were struggling galit ka samen. Hahahah Bago na?

author: Pat :)
text: 9. I just noticed whener may meeting. The word "I" instead of "We" So ikaw lang? Remember - You represent us. Hahaha Diko ramdam yung "Team/Group" or whatsoever.

author: Pat :)
text:
2. During our meeting, you shouted pointing out our mistakes but without us knowing ano ba yun? 

3. You always said," Hindi makitid or hindi ako selfish" You are! I am sorry, honey.

author: Pat :)
text: 1. You lost me when you started to be eated by your emotion than to think rationally. Remember when you suddenly created a meeting that conflicted our Plotted 1x1. Remember what you said? "Mamaya nayan. Ako ang unahan nyo"

author: Pat :)
text:
An Open Letter to my Dearest Boss P. 

Dito nalang ako maglalabas ng sama ng Loob  because I know you will always think that you are the right one. I get it. Tama ka in all aspect. But please hear me out.

author: Pat :)
text: I never knew it was you until I sat down beside you and you put your arms around me. That moment I realized it's you that I want to keep, to save and to protect in every way that I can.I just wish you felt that connection too.

author: Pat :)
text: Sige continue to give us nothing. https://t.co/ufk0CGCcVn
